name: VindicatorEntityHelper
description: The `VindicatorEntityHelper` class is a specialized wrapper for vindicator entities in JSMacros, providing access to vindicator-specific behaviors, states, and unique characteristics. This class extends `IllagerEntityHelper` and inherits all illager entity methods while adding vindicator-specific functionality, most notably the ability to detect the special "Johnny" variant.
overview: This class represents vindicators, the hostile illager mobs armed with iron axes that are commonly found in woodland mansions and during raids. Vindicators are known for their aggressive melee combat behavior and their special "Johnny" naming Easter egg that causes them to attack all mobs except other illagers.

methods.name: isJohnny
methods.description: Checks if the vindicator is the special "Johnny" variant. This method specifically checks for the exact name "Johnny" (case-sensitive) which causes it to attack all mobs except other illagers.

methods.name: isCelebrating
methods.description: Check if the vindicator is celebrating (e.g., after raids).

methods.name: getState
methods.description: Get current activity state of the vindicator. Possible values include: `CROSSED`, `ATTACKING`, `SPELLCASTING` (not applicable), `BOW_AND_ARROW` (not applicable), `CROSSBOW_HOLD` (not applicable), `CROSSBOW_CHARGE` (not applicable), `CELEBRATING` (same as `isCelebrating()`), `NEUTRAL`.

methods.name: isAttacking
methods.description: Check if the vindicator is currently attacking.

methods.name: isAiDisabled
methods.description: Check if the vindicator's AI is disabled.

methods.name: getHealth
methods.description: Get the vindicator's current health points.

methods.name: getMaxHealth
methods.description: Get the vindicator's maximum health points.

methods.name: getAbsorptionHealth
methods.description: Get the vindicator's absorption hearts.

methods.name: getArmor
methods.description: Get the vindicator's current armor value.

methods.name: getStatusEffects
methods.description: Get a list of the vindicator's active status effects.

methods.name: hasStatusEffect
methods.description: Check if the vindicator has a specific status effect.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The resource ID of the status effect.

methods.name: isOnGround
methods.description: Check if the vindicator is currently on the ground.

methods.name: canBreatheInWater
methods.description: Check if the vindicator can breathe underwater.

methods.name: isFallFlying
methods.description: Check if the vindicator is fall flying (e.g., with elytra).

methods.name: isBaby
methods.description: Check if the vindicator is a baby variant (vindicators do not have baby variants).

methods.name: isHolding
methods.description: Check if the vindicator is holding a specific item.

methods.name: canSeeEntity
methods.description: Check if the vindicator has line of sight to another entity.

parameters.name: entity
parameters.description: The target entity to check line of sight against.

methods.name: getBowPullProgress
methods.description: Get the bow pull progress (not applicable to vindicators).

methods.name: getItemUseTimeLeft
methods.description: Get the remaining item use time.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Get the entity's display name.

methods.name: getPos
methods.description: Get the entity's position.

methods.name: getUUID
methods.description: Get the entity's unique identifier.

methods.name: hasCustomName
methods.description: Check if the entity has a custom name.

methods.name: isAlive
methods.description: Check if the entity is currently alive.

methods.name: distanceTo
methods.description: Calculates the distance to another entity.

methods.name: is
methods.description: Checks if the entity is of a specific type by its resource ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The resource ID of the entity type (e.g., 'minecraft:vindicator').

methods.name: setGlowing
methods.description: Sets whether the entity is glowing.

parameters.name: glowing
parameters.description: True to make the entity glow, false otherwise.

methods.name: setGlowingColor
methods.description: Sets the color of the entity's glow effect.

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: The integer color value (e.g., 0xFF0000 for red).
